nodes.title: Open Source Business Analytics
nodes.summary: The full capabilities open source suite for modern business analytics

product.summary: Distributed, free and open search and analytics engine
Helps you make sense of your data
Open source fork of Elasticsearch and Kibana
A tool for making open data websites
The full capabilities open source suite for modern business analytics
a user-contributed database of biological databases
The leading open source project for visualizing metrics
A modern, enterprise-ready business intelligence web application

overview.overview: Knowage is the full capabilities open source suite for modern business analytics over traditional sources and big data systems.

highlights: Pre-configured, one-click to deploy on Cloud Server
All codes on your server, secure and customizable
Paid image, free professional support for your business

childMarkdownRemark.html: This is a repackaged Knowage Community Edition with professional support for your business. Knowage is a smart solution since the beginning big data. Combine structured historical enterprise data with external multistructured ones. Knowage Community Edition is not a toy version or a trial with relevant restrictions. Coming from the long history of SpagoBI, Knowage Community Edition includes all analytical capabilities and guarantees a full end-user experience.

faq.key: What the relationship between Knowage and SpagoBI?
faq.value: Knowage is the evolution of SpagoBI

faq.key: If there is no domain name, can I deploy Knowage?
faq.value: Yes, visit Knowage by http://Server's Internet IP:8080/knowage or http://Server's Internet IP

faq.key: Is there a web-base GUI database management tools?
faq.value: Yes, phpMyAdmin is on it, visit by http://Server's Internet IP:9090
